name: StaringTime
description:
A short First Person Horror game made by FATAL1N3

A dark room full of dark forces , your only way to stay sane is to Stare at Time...

One Demon will want you to look at it, DON'T! The others are afraid of the Light.

Input Guide: Press F to turn light on/off and Mouse to look around

All assets, Coding and sound created by myself.

I hope you escape!
